Proof of Concept (POC) Development for Startups

Have you ever had a brilliant idea that you were excited to pursue, only to discover that it wasn’t feasible or didn’t work as expected? This happens with all the startups but there is one solution: Developing a Proof of Concept (POC). It allows entrepreneurs like you to test their innovative ideas before investing significant resources into development. With a POC, you can develop a scaled-down version of your product to test its core features and functions, gather feedback from potential customers, and refine your product roadmap. It’s like a “trial run” for your idea, providing valuable insights into your product and its potential success in the market. 

At Codevian, we provide POC Development for startups to make their startup product ready for the market. We help you test your idea at an early stage, so you can identify potential issues and areas of improvement. This will let help you develop a more effective product strategy, and ultimately increase your chances of success as a startup. So, if you have a brilliant idea, don’t hesitate to explore it with a POC – who knows, it might just be the next big thing!

The Journey from POC to MVP Development for startups

Development of Proof of Concept (POC)

We help you determine your idea’s feasibility and whether it’s worth investing more time, money, and resources into developing a full product

Modeling and Designing

After POC development, we refine the design, identify issues and gather feedback from users to inform further development.

Rolling out Minimum Viable Product (MVP)

We develop a stable product with core features, collect user feedback, and aim to deliver value and meet user needs in designing and launching an MVP.

IT Startup Solutions & Support for All Stages

01

Early-stage Startup

In the early stage, we help startups by providing strategic guidance and IT solutions that lay a strong foundation for growth.  This includes strategic planning from the start of the development of your app to the deployment — and everything in between.

  • Ideation and Strategic Planning
  • Proof of Concept (POC) Development
  • Minimum Viable Product Development
  • Product Design & Development
  • Digital Transformation

02

Growth-stage Startup

During the growth stage, we assist startups by scaling their IT infrastructure, optimizing processes, and implementing advanced technologies. From redefining technologies to introducing new products or services — we help you scale up your business.

  • Scalable IT Solutions
  • Technology Upgrades
  • Mobile App Development
  • Cloud Computing Solution
  • Business Practices Optimization

03

Late-stage Startup

In the late stage, we help startups fine-tune their IT strategies to maximize efficiency, productivity, and profitability. This will help your startup rise above your competitors and take the next step towards your big goal.

  • Software Modernization
  • IT Consulting
  • Product Re-engineering
  • Business Intelligence
  • Cloud Migration

We Help Startups in Many Ways

We offer comprehensive IT solutions & services to help startups with the product development and digital transformation process.

Start today

Startup Product Development

Once the MVP has been launched and tested, we continue developing and iterating on the product to improve its functionality. By providing ongoing product development services, we can help you to stay ahead of the curve.

IT Support & Consultation for Startups

By providing ongoing support and consultation, we ensure the long-term success of your product. Having experience in startup product development, we can help you address issues quickly and prevent potential problems from becoming big issues. 

Digitalization

As the business landscape continues to evolve, digital transformation is becoming increasingly important for startups. By offering digital transformation services for your startup, we can help you modernize your operations and scale up. 

Why Choose us as Your Startup IT Consulting & Solution Partner?

Wide Experience with Startups

Our team has gained significant insights and skills through our experience while working together with a diverse range of startups. This ideally positions us to guide your business to long-term success while generating maximum ROI

User-focused Approach

Our user-centric approach lets us prioritize the preferences of end-users when designing and developing products. This can help you build products that meet the needs of your target audience and get higher customer satisfaction.

Continuous Development

Our continuous delivery and development process let us deliver new features and updates to the product quickly and precisely. This can help startups like yours to stay ahead of the curve and respond carefully to changing market conditions and customer needs.

Skilled Team

We have a team of IT professionals with a wide range of technical and industry-specific expertise. Their skills can help you navigate the challenges of the product development process and make informed decisions about technology, design, and strategy.

Agile Development Practices

Our agile development approach allows us to prioritize flexibility, collaboration, and speed when building products. This helps startups to adapt to changing needs and requirements, reduce the risk of errors and delays, and build high-quality products in less time.

Innovation and Creativity

We always emphasise developing innovative and creative products that help you differentiate from your competition. With our team, you can build sophisticated products that meet the evolving needs of your customers.

Why Choose Us as Your Small business or Startup IT Consulting & Solution Partner?

User-focused Approach

Get Ready to Transform Your Startup's Journey and Drive Exponential Growth

Your startup idea can be turned into reality with the help of an experienced and skilled team. 

Start today

Our Strategic Process for Your IT Solution

This ten-step plan provides a framework to build a successful solution for your small business and startup, from ideation to continuous improvement, while ensuring that the product meets the needs of the target audience and delivers value to the market.

1.Identifying the problem

We identify the problem you want to solve and ensure that there is a demand for a solution that your startup idea will offer.

2.Conducting market research

Our team conducts market research to understand your target audience, competition, and market trends.

3.Developing a business plan

We develop a business plan that outlines your goals, target market, pricing strategy, and revenue model while considering all aspects.

4.Creating a (POC)

Our team then creates a proof-of-concept (POC) to test the feasibility of your solution and gather feedback from users.

5.Designing a prototype

Once POC is created, we move forward to create a prototype based on the feedback we receive from the POC.

6.Development of MVP

When everything is on track, we develop a Minimum Viable Product (MVP) with core features that resonate with the target audience.

7.Testing and Product QA

We continuously test and refine the product considering the feedback received from the users to improve its functionality.

8.Launching the product

Once everything is ready, we launch your product in the market and monitor its performance to identify areas for improvement.

9.Scaling the produc

Once your product is successful and stable, we scale it by expanding the target market or adding new features.

10.Continuous improvement

Your startup product development doesn’t end here. We continuously improve the product based on customer feedback and market trends to help you gain a competitive edge and meet evolving customer needs.

Our Engagement Model for Startups

If you’re ready to start building your startup product today, Codevian can help you get started with the following options

Dedicated Product Development Team

When we are working on your project, we assign a dedicated development team that will work only on your project. This team will be tailored to match your unique needs and on the basis of their technical and industry-specific experience

Team Augmentation

We are an app development company for startups that can offer team augmentation if you already have a development team but require additional employees to expand or take on a particular project.

Simple Project Model

For startups that have to carry out particular projects on a predetermined schedule and budget, we offer a project-based strategy. This will give you a clear scope of work, timeframe, and budget and will let you execute your project with success.

WHAT OUR CLIENTS SAY ABOUT Codevian

Over 1200+ Satisfied Clients and Growing

Entire web development team attention to every detail of our design, layout, color pallet, branding, and presentation. Their communication and response time was excellent and they welcomed our input. Patiently heard all our concerns or recommendations. We continue to use Codevian for our future projects and we highly recommend them.

Michael (Mike) Lancey

President and CEO Mckenzie Chase Management

Codevian team is amazing. My project was fairly complicated and I never had to micromanage. Yogesh and his team communicated perfectly what I asked of them and provided work that was above what was expected. Worth every penny if you want your project done right the first time.

Carole Bacon

CEO at BullHead City web

What services do startup IT services typically offer?

We always endeavour to give answers to the most frequently asked questions. Please do not be worried if you do not find the exact one as our professionals are always available to answer your questions. To contact us, please use the link given below.

Contact Us
What services do startup IT services typically offer?

Front-end development includes the creation of visual and interactive elements that users see and engage with on websites and applications. It considers design, layout, and functionality for a smooth user experience.

How can startup IT services help me with my business?

Startup IT services can help you turn your business idea into a viable product by providing expertise in product development, digital transformation, and ongoing support.

What is the process for developing a startup idea into a product?

The process typically starts with ideation and workshop sessions to refine the idea and create a roadmap. This is followed by proof-of-concept (POC) development, prototyping, and MVP development. After launch, ongoing support and maintenance are provided to ensure the product’s success.

How do I know if my idea is viable and worth investing in?

Startup IT services can help you conduct market research and validate your idea to determine if it has potential. They can also provide guidance on how to improve your idea to make it more viable and attractive to investors.

How long does it typically take to develop a product from ideation to launch?

The timeline can vary depending on the complexity of the product and the scope of work. However, the typical timeframe is around 3-12 months from ideation to launch.

What are the pricing models for startup IT services?

We typically offer flexible pricing models, including project-based pricing, time and material, and dedicated teams. The pricing model is typically based on the scope of work and the needs of the startup.
